name: BEST WESTERN Eastern Shore

reviews.text: At the discounted rate I got through a website, this was a good value. Regular rates here a little steep. However, location is great; room and hotel are very clean; staff very friendly. Only negative is that their wireless internet is usable only in the hotel lobby.
reviews.title: Pretty Good Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a comfortable motel and in generally good shape but it could do with a bit of attention to detail. Our nicely sized room was a hodge-podge of furniture, none of which looked like it was placed where intended, but most importantly, the bed was very comfortable. Wireless didn't reach to our room so I had to stay at the desk when I would have preferred to be sitting in bed using the internet. The bathroom, although basically clean, needs a good corner scrubbing. We had an interior room overlooking the pool so road noise was nonexistent...a good thing. The breakfast was ok, nothing special. Friendly staff directed us to dinner at the unassuming Mexican restaurant (El Maguey) across Rt 13, and that was fantastic. Overall, a satisfactory stay. Two story, interior halls, no elevator.
reviews.title: Good location on Rt 13 No surprises

reviews.text: There are some bad reviews for this hotel and they are not very true. We stayed overnight on our trip to outer banks and hotel was very nice. Clean, safe and staff was very helpful. Breakfast was very good (not a hot breakfast), breakfast room was clean (well at least until all the kids showed up). We will be staying there again and I would recommend this hotel for others.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Verrrryyy nice group of people, everything was very clean. PET FRIENDLY, which there were no other hotels around that are such. Quiet and peaceful place. Will visit again! Despite everyone's reviews, this place has done a complete turn-around!
reviews.title: GREAT
Clean and Comfortable
reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I have stayed at this hotel and this time I brought my two dogs. The hotel accomodated me just fine. They were polite and very helpful. There were no fleas or other bugs in my room. The room was clean. Also I took note to the fact they are gradually renovating the hotel. I would definitely stay here again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Best Western Eastern Shore Inn for one night on a Saturday. This is the only commercial chain hotel near Exmore, VA. The only alternative to the Best Western are a series of very old (circa 1930s) and scary looking motels.
reviews.title: Quiet night's sleep, but buggy
Lousy experience
reviews.text: I normally take my chances staying at Starwood group hotel, but this time we stayed at the the BW because we didn't know the area and we didn't want to drive for three hours to get home after a wedding reception.
The breakfast area was littered with critters. Not good eats.
reviews.title: Best Hotel Ever
Basic but Nice, Allows Dogs
reviews.text: I don't expect to have the occasion to stay in the hotel again.

reviews.title: Impressed
reviews.text: I am a frequent visitor to this part of the Eastern Shore and know how difficult it can be to find a decent hotel. This hotel had good reviews, but so far that's all it had going for it. I booked several months ago and guaranteed it with my credit card. Prior to 6 pm I called and confirmed that my rooms were guaranteed since my credit card company had issued a new card since booking. I was assured they were guaranteed. When I arrived they had sold one of the rooms and wouldn't budge until someone called an cancelled a room. It took 30 minutes to check in and it's a myth that the hotel has wifi throughout despite promotional material that it does.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here last year for a family reunion because the Comfort Inn in Olney was booked. Well, it was a nice change even though it was a few miles out of way but it was worth it. The staff was super friendly and accommodating and our room was roomy and clean.
reviews.title: Excellent Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A very good local hotel with a front desk person that is so good I would hire him to run my hotel if I had one.
reviews.title: Very Good Friendly Local Hotel
Great Halfway Stop En Route To Outer Banks
reviews.text: We are from NJ and this hotel is the perfect "a little over halfway there" stop on the way to Cape Hatteras, NC. The staff is very pleasant, and they have a nice outdoor pool with tables. The rooms are becoming in need of an update, but all was clean.
We were on our way down to Cape Charles to play at Bay Creek and this was within a reasonable distance. Rooms were clean and quiet (at least on the pool side) and the service was great.
reviews.title: Clean and quiet with great service

reviews.text: The Best Western in Exmore, Virginia, is a decent place to stay. Not the Ritz but it is fine. Friendly staff, clean pool, typical continental breakfast. I've stayed there before and will stay again.
reviews.title: Decent hotel for the price

reviews.text: My husband is from this area and when we go back to visit, we usually stay here. It's clean, quiet and the restaurant next door is good.
reviews.title: Clean, respectable hotel
great little hotel
reviews.text: However, to me, the beds are hard and the last time I had difficulty sleeping, but in this area there aren't many other options. For that reason, we will probably stay again.

description: This charming Exmore, Virginia hotel offers convenient access to Tangiers Island, Kiptopeke State Park and more!Located on Virginia's U.S. Route 13, the BEST WESTERN Eastern Shore Inn is the only hotel in the Exmore area with an adjacent restaurant. We offer clean comfortable accommodations and a convenient location for a reasonable rate. This Exmore hotel offers easy access to local beaches, art galleries and attractions such as the Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge and Kiptopeke National Park. Each well-appointed guest room features cable satellite television with HBO® and high-speed Internet access. Start the day off with a complimentary continental breakfast with hot items, or breakfast at the full service Sage Diner located adjacent to the hotel. Other hotel amenities include an outdoor heated swimming pool, guest laundry and some business services. Pets are welcome!Just minutes from the hotel, guests can visit local attractions such as The Painter Gallery or the Turner Sculpture Gallery. Take a quick day trip to Tangiers Island or NASA Wallops Island. Guests will also enjoy spending the day exploring the Eastern Shore Railway Museum, the Decoy Factory Gift Shop or the Maritime & Oyster Museum.
